resources: E-Trash Alert the Hotspots Classify using AI Share the Location Share the images and report the location of waste dump to the government. Classify the wastes using image recognition technology. View the location of waste dump or share the location of waste dump to the government. E-Trash is a waste management application. Here you will be able to connect with your nearest vendor based on your location. An App to alert the government This app is created by the students of Department of Information Technology batch [ 2021-2025 ] from University College of Engineering E-Mail: ETrash@gmail.com Phone: 987654321 Places.initialize(getApplicationContext(),AIzaSyDEgGDI0l9VmnIgrZODvYCES9bWLF7HwxQ);
